channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Your whole life is on the phone.’ Should companies like Verizon be forced to refund you the next time there’s a major outage?
item.description: In the meantime, here’s how to claim the $20 credit Verizon is offering in response to this week’s service disruption.

item.title: The economy is shockingly strong by one measure. This year could be even better.
item.description: Stubborn inflation, high tariffs and plunging job creation didn’t do much to slow the economy in 2025. Now the stage is set for even stronger growth.

item.title: Inflation could unexpectedly climb this year. How these market veterans are preparing.

item.title: My mom, 90, has dementia. My brother wants her to buy a $500K house near his house. Does that make any sense?
item.description: “I can’t, for the life of me, see how this makes sense on any level — personal or financial.”

item.title: ‘I don’t want to step on any toes’: I manage an $80K trust for a 15-year-old relative. How do I deal with interfering relatives?
item.description: “I also want to teach my young relative good money habits without overstepping the parents’ authority.”

item.title: Here are Needham's top picks for 2026
item.description: Needham compiled its list by polling researchers for their ideas about which stocks would outperform in 2026.

item.title: Honeywell is a buy as planned break-up continues, JPMorgan says
item.description: Investors should scoop up shares of Honeywell before the company completes its break-up, according to JPMorgan.

item.title: This gym stock could see a boost from increase weight-loss pill use, says Stifel
item.description: Planet Fitness could be among the beneficiaries of the GLP-1 craze, according to Stifel.

item.title: Josh Brown: This real estate name on our Best Stocks list has seen a major transformation
item.description: Josh Brown and Sean Russo take a look at this real estate name on their list.

item.title: Trump wants tech companies to foot the bill for new power plants because of AI
item.description: Utility bills are rising in many parts of the U.S. despite Trump's promise to lower energy prices during his presidential campaign.
